title: Chapter 1: Introduction to AI and Its History
description: Understand the scope and evolution of artificial intelligence, exploring its beginnings and major milestones in its development.

title: Chapter 2: Core Concepts: Machine Learning Basics
description: Articulate key machine learning terms and concepts, laying the foundation for understanding machine learning methodologies.

title: Chapter 3: Supervised vs Unsupervised Learning
description: Differentiate between supervised and unsupervised learning paradigms, emphasizing their distinct applications and techniques.

title: Chapter 4: Natural Language Processing
description: Explain the fundamentals of natural language processing, its methodologies, and its practical applications in AI.

title: Chapter 5: AI in Robotics
description: Explore the applications of AI in robotics and automation, discussing real-world implementations and their implications.

title: Chapter 6: AI Ethics and Social Implications
description: Evaluate ethical considerations surrounding the implementation of AI technologies and their social impacts.

title: Chapter 7: Introduction to Python for AI
description: Gain foundational programming skills using Python as a primary tool for developing AI applications.

title: Chapter 8: Practical Skills: TensorFlow / PyTorch
description: Implement basic AI models using popular frameworks like TensorFlow and PyTorch, focusing on practical applications.

title: Chapter 9: Advanced AI Techniques
description: Analyze advanced techniques in machine learning and deep learning, understanding their complexities and applications.

title: Chapter 10: Capstone Project Development
description: Apply learned concepts to develop an AI model or application, consolidating knowledge and skills gained throughout the course.

title: Chapter 11: Case Studies in AI
description: Discuss real-world AI applications through case studies, identifying challenges and solutions that arise in various fields.

title: Chapter 12: Collaboration: Group Work on AI Projects
description: Enhance teamwork and communication skills in technical settings through group projects focused on AI.

title: Chapter 13: Future Trends in AI
description: Assess the future implications of AI technology on society, considering emerging trends and potential developments.

title: Chapter 14: Course Review and Final Reflections
description: Synthesize learning from the course and establish future learning goals to continue developing skills and knowledge in AI.
